name: Land of Crystals
description:
Embark on a journey of exploration in Land of Crystals! Play as Destiny, a girl who has the ability to activate the magical power of healing crystals by cleansing them. Various monsters have been created through Destiny's dark past, which you are called upon to discover. For this reason, the nearby towns of Land of Crystals will need your help confronting the attacking monsters and overcoming all the psychological vulnerabilities.

Features:

  • Collect and cleanse over 100 healing crystals, and then use them in the battles against the attacking monsters!
  • Explore a vast world filled with healing crystals, unique landmarks, and hidden secrets.


  • Fight your way through the monsters that are created from Destiny's psychological states, in the unique crystal-based tactical battles.


  • Participate in trading events from which you can collect even more crystals in exchange for a variety of collectibles.
  • Immerse yourself in a captivating soundtrack that sets the tone for your exploration journey,


  • Save the nearby towns and try to convince the locals about your real intentions.
